name: Web Search Example Workflow
description: A workflow that uses web search to find information and then processes it with ChatGPT

input.value: Let us write an email to Igor

ai_models.name: web_search
ai_models.task: Find recent articles on Igor Schwarzmann in Berlin
ai_models.prompt_template: Find information about Igor Schwarzmann in Berlin

ai_models.name: chatgpt
ai_models.task: Summarize the retrieved articles into a beautiful poem
ai_models.prompt_template:
Based on the following information about Igor Schwarzmann, create a beautiful poem:

{input}

ai_models.name: chatgpt
ai_models.task: Write an email intro from sender Jens that references the poem
ai_models.prompt_template:
Write an email introduction from Jens to Igor Schwarzmann that references this poem:

{input}
